meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jackie Welles Bill Schuler Bruce Cox Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1089.

td.p: Jackie Welles, an assistant professor from Elmira, New York
Bill Schuler, a systems administrator from San Francisco, California
Bruce Cox, an analyst from Lakeside, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $44,900)

tr.td: "L" WORDS
THE '30s
DANCE
CONNECTICUT
BIRDS
BEES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: We\'ve had some trouble with the readouts the past few weeks, so Bill wrote his response on the card and [showing it to the camera] he wrote the correct response.)
JackieWho is Glenda Jackson
$2,499
BruceWho is Kate Hepburn?
$6,200
BillWho is Hepburn?
$5,101
Katharine Hepburn (The Lion in Winter)')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '"Best Actress" for 1968, she was the only one in Oscar history to win for playing a queen')

tr.td: THE ACADEMY AWARDS
"Best Actress" for 1968, she was the only one in Oscar history to win for playing a queen
Bruce
Bill
Jackie
2nd place: OKI Telecom cellular mobile telephone & Jasons binoculars
New champion: $12,401
3rd place: Smith Corona PWP 40 word processor
Bruce
Bill
Jackie

19 R
(including 2 DDs),
6 W

12 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)
